headline.main: LOSS OF BURMA MEANS A BIG SETBACK IN ASIA; Japanese Are Freer to Launch New Offensives and Harder to Attack

lead_paragraph: The fall of Lashio, gateway to the Burma Road, brought to tragic climax last week another campaign of the "too little and too late" class.
snippet: The fall of Lashio, gateway to the Burma Road, brought to tragic climax last week another campaign of the "too little and too late" class....
